alert.note: Alert for Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 18 at 2:09PM MDT until April 19 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MDT WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH FOR WEDNESDAY NIGHT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 6 to 12 inches at lower elevations and 15 to 30 inches in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to Noon MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near blizzard conditions are possible tonight.
info.instruction: To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains
